title: >>> The DRAFT
body_text:
The postponement of the long-awaited
Adams/Fitzpatrick
clash has left a void in the world of dodgeball. And thus, the replacememt plan will be a first for the sport -
The Dodgeball Draft
.
DODGEBALL 101
will play host to this new and unique concept making for an interesting evening of the non-stop, hard-hitting action many thrive on.
Find out exactly what happens on August 25 when "it all begins again".
body_html:
The postponement of the long-awaited Adams/Fitzpatrick clash has left a void in the world of dodgeball. And thus, the replacememt plan will be a first for the sport - The Dodgeball Draft.

DODGEBALL 101 will play host to this new and unique concept making for an interesting evening of the non-stop, hard-hitting action many thrive on.

Find out exactly what happens on August 25 when "it all begins again".
